command.send.message.description: Sends an anonymous message to an user.
command.send.message.to: Send to who? (Must be in the member list)
command.link.description: Let people know your ask box is open.
command.link.title: A custom title for your ask.
command.asks.description: Enable or disable your ask box.
error.title: Error!
error.asks_closed: {0} doesn't have asks enabled at this moment.
error.private_message_only: This command can only be used in the bot's DMs.
error.no_app:
The user doesn't have TBH added as an app.
Tell them to add it!
App link: https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1315828152785698869
error.unknown: I'm not entirely sure what I did wrong, but I clearly did something wrong :[
success.title: Success!
embed.link.title: {0} has made a new ask!
embed.link.description: [**Add TBH to your apps**]({0}) to send them anonymous messages.
embed.asks.enable.title: Enabled asks
embed.asks.enable.description: You enabled your ask box. Use `/link` to notify your friends!
embed.asks.disable.title: Disabled asks
embed.tbh.help.title: How to use TBH
embed.tbh.help.description:
-Send asks to people with `/send message`
-Open up your ask box with `/link`
embed.see_origin.title: Ask origin
embed.see_origin.unknown.description: Unknown origin. This is probably an error!
embed.see_origin.server.description: This ask comes from a server.
embed.see_origin.group_chat.description: This ask comes from a group chat.
embed.see_origin.direct_message.descript: This ask comes from a DM. Good luck!
